channel.title: [Class Suggestion] (Unique) The Queen / The Empress
channel.description:
**The Queen(BD Special)** (This class has a %25~%50 of spawning each game.) **Passive:** Royal Blood
**Day Ability:** Royal Execution Infinite Uses Your vote will count twice in trial execution.(People won't be notified)
**Night Ability:** Savior 1 Use You can cure the king of poison, it will reveal his aligment, but you will take your own life if he is evil.
**Night Ability:** Mischief Infinitive Uses Mischief someone, forcing them to guard someone(Queen can only target self once).
Forced: The Queen made you target someone, guarding them for the rest of the night.
**The Empress (Unseen Special)** **Passive:** Royal Blood
**Day Ability:** Stealth Slap 2 Uses Slap someone, preventing them from accusing anyone of treason.
**Day Ability:** Influence King 1 Use You can influence The King's decide fate/or use decide fate as if King used it, confusing the court into believing King is evil.
**Night Ability:** Reveal Whispers 1 Use You will reveal all whispers to yourself(excluding Noble's), but the people who whisper will still think their whisper was successful.
**Night Ability:** Treachery 1 Use You can poison the king, killing him in two days if not healed by Physician or Alchemist.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] (Unique) The Queen / The Empress
item.dc:creator: Scoundrella
item.description:
With the Savior ability… problem I see with this is:

the Queen putting in her logs n3 - Savior King

D4 queen dies. Confirmed evil king.
It’s already hard enough to win as evil king :/.

The ability sounds amazing though. It could cause a lot of arguing over the queens death and wether or not she was killed, or died from saving an evil king. I am pretty sure that was the aim of the ability, but like i said, I think evil king is hard enough already

item.title: [Class Suggestion] (Unique) The Queen / The Empress
item.dc:creator: AdyShaman
item.description:
I would love to see the Queen added to the game, along with Empress convertable, like we talked about the gap between Queen and Empress in discord, Unseen could have promised the Queen more lands to reign over thus converting her to Empress.

25-50% spawn chance sounds fine - only Unseen games?

The slap would allow the duchess to blame that the Queen is evil or the Empress that the Princess was converted, i feel like that would be great addition to the game.

So overall, the abilities sound balanced, yet fun to play.

Read full topic
